name: Numix scrollbars for Chrome/Chromium
description: This style provides matching scrollbars for the beautiful Numix theme: http://satya164.deviantart.com/art/Numix-GTK3-theme-360223962 It is based on Simple Scrollbars by m1n1f1g.
additional_info: The style does not work on HTTPS pages (it's a security limit of Stylish) and on "internal" Chrome/Chromium pages such as the preferences.
